lankawe danata sidu wena aluthma kridawak pilibadawa awadhanaya yomu wiya yuthuwa thibenawa.ada (mayi 05)rathri puwathwalin madakalapuwe dariyak paharagena gos mara damimata adala sakakaruwan ath adanguwata ganna laduwa ikbithi miya giya siduwimak wartha wuna.me samagama pasugiya dineka sidu wu warsha jud dariyage khedawachakaya saha eyata sambandha wuwa yayi pawasena tharunayan siwu denage ghathana siduwim mathakayata nagenawa.me siduwim dekehima samanakam bohomayak thibenawa.dekedima dariyak paharaganima sidu wi thibena athara eeta saka pita athadanguwata ganna lada aya polis wedi paharin ath adanguwedi miya gos thibenawa.
